sentences.chinese: 項梁號為武信君，英布為當陽君。
sentences.literal: Xiang Liang styled Wu Xin jun, Ying Bu as Dangyang jun.
sentences.idiomatic: Xiang Liang was styled Lord Wu Xin, Ying Bu as Lord Dangyang.

sentences.chinese: 項梁敗死定陶，懷王徙都彭城，諸將英布亦皆保聚彭城。
sentences.literal: Xiang Liang defeated died Dingtao, Huai king moved capital Pengcheng, various generals Ying Bu also all defended gathered Pengcheng.
sentences.idiomatic: Xiang Liang was defeated and died at Dingtao. The King of Huai moved his capital to Pengcheng. The various generals, including Ying Bu, all defended and gathered at Pengcheng.

sentences.chinese: 當是時，秦急圍趙，趙數使人請救。
sentences.literal: At this time, Qin urgently besieged Zhao, Zhao repeatedly sent persons requested rescue.
sentences.idiomatic: At this time, Qin urgently besieged Zhao, and Zhao repeatedly sent people requesting rescue.

sentences.chinese: 懷王使宋義為上將，范曾為末將，項籍為次將，英在、蒲將軍皆為將軍，悉屬宋義，北救趙。
sentences.literal: Huai king sent Song Yi as supreme general, Fan Zeng as rear general, Xiang Ji as deputy general, Ying Zai, Pu general all as generals, all belonged Song Yi, north rescued Zhao.
sentences.idiomatic: The King of Huai sent Song Yi as supreme general, Fan Zeng as rear general, Xiang Ji as deputy general, Ying Zai and General Pu all as generals. They all belonged to Song Yi and went north to rescue Zhao.

sentences.chinese: 及項籍殺宋義於河上，懷王因立籍為上將軍，諸將皆屬項籍。
項籍使布先渡河擊秦，布數有利，籍迺悉引兵涉河從之，遂破秦軍，降章邯等。
諸侯兵皆以服屬楚者，以布數以少敗眾也。
項籍之引兵西至新安，又使布等夜擊阬章邯秦卒二十餘萬人。
至關，不得入，又使布等先從閒道破關下軍，遂得入，至咸陽。
項王封諸將，立布為九江王，都六。
漢元年四月，諸侯皆罷戲下，各就國。
項氏立懷王為義帝，徙都長沙，乃陰令九江王布等行擊之。
其八月，布使將擊義帝，追殺之郴縣。
